Sentence.sentence: 8 hours at work daily, and the majority of working professionals  spend additional hours checking in with work during evenings, weekends and even vacations.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"夜，晚上"之意。
means: evening ： 指日落到就寝之间的时间。
night ： 指从日落到日出或从黄昏到拂晓这段时间。

means.word_mean: 傍晚, 黄昏, 晚上

sentences.en: Evening in the country is a very peaceful time.
sentences.cn: 乡村里的傍晚是平静安谧的时刻。

sentences.en: On summer evenings we often have supper in the garden.
sentences.cn: 夏季的晚上, 我们常常在花园里吃饭。

means.word_mean: 晚会, 晚上娱乐活动

sentences.en: We held an English evening last week.
sentences.cn: 上周我们举行了一次英语晚会。</seg>

entry.def: The evening is the part of each day between the end of the afternoon and the time when you go to bed.

example.ex: All he did that evening was sit around the flat...
example.tran: 那天晚上他一直在公寓里无所事事地坐着。

example.ex: Supper is from 5.00 to 6.00 in the evening...
example.tran: 晚餐在傍晚5点到6点之间。

means.word_mean: 1. the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall);

sentences.sentence: "he enjoyed the evening light across the lake"
"it was the evening of the Roman Empire"

means.word_mean: 3. the early part of night (from dinner until bedtime) spent in a special way;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ǣfnung 'dusk falling, the time around sunset', from ǣfnian 'approach evening', from ǣfen (see even)

sentences.en: I've never seen anyone spend so much in one evening; he must have money to burn!

sentences.en: John and Susan phoned. They're coming round this evening.

sentences.en: I got up and walked calmly out into the early evening.

sentences.en: She conditioned her acceptance of the gift on his coming to dinner next evening.

sentences.en: On Friday evening he passed this word along.

sentences.en: That evening they saw her get on the No.12 special express to London.

sentences.cn: 会议一直拖到晚上.
sentences.en: The meeting was prolonged into the evening.

sentences.en: As the evening was drawing to an end , the firework display took place.

sentences.cn: 今晚我有客.
sentences.en: I have company this evening.

sentences.cn: 这件睡衣是用真丝做的.
sentences.en: The evening dress is made out of pure silk.

sentences.cn: 晚上过得很愉快.
sentences.en: The evening went pleasantly enough.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的夜晚坐在炉火旁边很舒服.
sentences.en: On a cold evening it is pleasant to sit by the fire.

sentences.cn: 晚餐在傍晚5点到6点之间。

sentences.en: She used to come here every Saturday evening as regular as clockwork.

sentences.en: On summer evenings the flowers gave forth an almost intoxicating scent.

sentences.cn: 美丽的沙滩, 广濶的空间, 在宜人的傍晚下班后烤肉.
sentences.en: Glorious beaches, wide open spaces, barbecues after work on balmy evenings.

sentences.cn: 那是个令人愉快的夏日傍晚,紫色的天空挂着一轮半弦月.
sentences.en: It a pleasant summer evening and a perfect half moon was rising in the purple sky.

sentences.en: Then it was time for the evening meeting with the preschool teachers.

sentences.cn: 就在这天的傍晚,绵羊首尾相衔地返回了羊栏.
sentences.en: The same evening the sheep had trailed homeward head to tail.

sentences.cn: 傍晚,暴风雨已经过去,四周开始沉寂下来.
sentences.en: By evening the storm had subsided and all was quiet again.

sentences.en: Evening was come, not with calm beauty but with the threat of violence.

sentences.en: I got up and walked calmly out into the early evening.

sentences.cn: 声音好像在傍晚空气中传播得远些.
sentences.en: Sound seems to carry better in the evening air.

sentences.cn: 1731年9月的某个傍晚,梅米在松吉村附近首次被人发现.
sentences.en: Memmie was first sighted near the village of Songi one September evening in 1731.

sentences.cn: 风到傍晚就会停的.
sentences.en: The windwill drop in the evening.

sentences.cn: 那就这么办,今天傍晚我索性把这个大烛台送给喜剧演员沙希金吧.
sentences.en: I know what ! I'll take it this evening to Shashkin, the comedian.

sentences.cn: 然而,在我回忆中的傍晚, 我总是会回到西点.
sentences.en: But in the evening of my memory, always I come back to West Point.

sentences.cn: 他们的节目出现在,很多的成人和老年人年龄观众正在收看的傍晚.
sentences.en: Their shows appear in evening when more adult and older aged viewers are watching.

sentences.cn: 巴丝谢芭到家的时候,傍晚的阴影已初露端倪.
sentences.en: The first shades of evening were showing themselves when Bathsheba reached home.

sentences.cn: 六号那天傍晚的时候,她要逃走的决心又活了.
sentences.en: Towards evening on the sixth her determination to go away again revived.

sentences.cn: 那是一个美妙的傍晚.
sentences.en: It was a lovely evening.

sentences.en: During the evening, Monte Cristo quitted Paris for Auteuil, accompanied by Ali.

sentences.cn: 当天傍晚,我穿过院子去找科林斯.
sentences.en: That evening I went across the quad to visit Collins.

sentences.cn: 傍晚最后一抹亮光消失了.
sentences.en: The last of evening light was fading away.

sentences.cn: 而那午后, 那傍晚, 如此静谧的熟睡!
sentences.en: And the afternoon, the evening, sleeps so peacefully!

sentences.cn: 乡村里的傍晚是平静安谧的时刻.
sentences.en: Evening in the country is a very peaceful time.

sentences.cn: 傍晚是有人通知我们,今晚经理要和我们一起吃饭.
sentences.en: Toward evening we were told that the manager's going to dine with us tonight.

sentences.cn: 傍晚回家,刚走到卧室门口,电话铃响.
sentences.en: In the evening he went home and had just reached his bedroom when the telephone rang.

sentences.cn: 景山公园会一直开到傍晚 ( 就像北海一样 ).
sentences.en: JingShan park, however , stays open into the evening ( as does BeiHai ).

sentences.en: This a monthly event held on a weekday's evening.

sentences.cn: 傍晚的空气中充满金银花的香味.
sentences.en: The evening air was sweet with the smell of honeysuckle.

sentences.cn: 只有这些美生灵自由自在地享受着这个黄昏.
sentences.en: Only these fair creatures are enjoying the evening at ease.

sentences.cn: 加菲尔德: 你和新女朋友相约黄昏后,玩得开心 吗 ?
sentences.en: Garfield: So how did the evening with your new date work out?

sentences.cn: 黄昏来临时,牧人来喂他的牲口.
sentences.en: At the approach of the evening the herdsman come to feed his cattle.

sentences.cn: 幽暗的黄昏中,房间一片宁静.
sentences.en: The room was quiet in the dimness of early evening.

sentences.cn: 黄昏时分,市场寂静下来了.
sentences.en: Quiet came over the marketplace towards the evening.

sentences.cn: 随着黄昏的来临,光线逐渐变弱.
sentences.en: Light lessens as evening comes on.

sentences.cn: 那是一个天朗气清的秋天的黄昏.
sentences.en: It was a crisp autumn evening.

sentences.cn: 您更可以在一个温馨的夏日黄昏走进自然.
sentences.en: You may retreat to nature as well on a cool summer evening.

sentences.cn: 黄昏一般来说是身体和大脑最放松的时候.
sentences.en: Evenings are generally as the body and the mind is more relaxed.

sentences.cn: 近黄昏时,开始起风了.
sentences.en: The wind woke toward evening.

sentences.cn: 黄昏之星的光芒,照耀在凯兰崔尔的精灵宝戒上.
sentences.en: The Light of the Evening Star shines through Galadriel's Ring.

sentences.cn: 用电量最大的时候是在黄昏时.
sentences.en: Demand for electricity peaks in the early evening.

sentences.cn: 从清晨到黄昏, 母子二人静静地在病室里迎送着时间.
sentences.en: From morning to evening, mother and son quietly bided time in the ward.

sentences.cn: 我颈上也曾戴着爱人用手织就的“芭库拉丝”黄昏花环.
sentences.en: I have worn round my neck the evening wreath of bakulas band of love.

sentences.cn: 黄昏时分,大雪纷飞.
sentences.en: It came on to snow heavily towards the evening.

sentences.en: To my great surprise , I got as much as five dollars towards evening.

sentences.cn: 一天黄昏时分,电话响了.
sentences.en: It was early evening when the phone rang.

sentences.cn: 他们预定在之前的周四黄昏与塞维利亚在欧洲联盟杯碰头.
sentences.en: They are due to play at Sevilla the Thursday evening before in a Uefa Cup tie.

sentences.cn: 夜间或黄昏时活动的 白鹭.
sentences.en: Becoming active in the evening as bats and owls ; crepuscular.

sentences.en: The heart such as bat suspected, it always takes off in the evening.

sentences.en: The evening sky to me is a window, and a lighted lamp.

sentences.cn: 黄昏时你带着狗在后巷散步.
sentences.en: You take your dog down the back alley for an evening walk.

sentences.cn: 我依旧只喜欢与寂寞的黄昏, 斜倚西窗, 望着夕阳.
sentences.en: I still like and only the lonely evening, Xieyixichuang, the sunset.

sentences.en: One December evening , three months afterwards, Count Bell was strolling in the Kurls Park.

sentences.en: We shall not arrive at our destination before evening.

sentences.en: Shadows become longer in the evening.
